title: Near-infrared-responsive Prussian blue nanocages loaded with 5-fluorouracil for combined chemotherapy and photothermal therapy in tumor treatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24942-24951
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04609A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhongyi Guo, Kang Fu, Jingyi Sun, Wenhao Du, Qisheng Hao, Xiao Hu
5-Fluorouracil was encapsulated in a Prussian blue nanocage using a phase change material to form a NIR-triggered controlled release nanocarrier. The combination of chemotherapy and photothermal therapy achieved effective killing of tumor cells.
